nodes.text: Marklo was a male Human Lieutenant of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Asylum he travelled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. Marklo greeted the Alliance Commander who departed with Miot Dengd and Theron Shan on a mission to take down a Star Fortress.
Lieutenant Marklo appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in the Alliance base on Odessen and begins the Star Fortress missions for the Imperial players.
